name: DEDALO_ENTITY
comment: Name of entity. Like 'demo'

name: DEDALO_ENTITY_LABEL
comment: Showed as title of html pages

name: DEDALO_ENTITY_ID
comment: From Master database private list

name: DEVELOPMENT_SERVER
comment: If true allow some special debug features

name: DEDALO_CACHE_MANAGER
comment: If true allow manage dedalo caches

name: SLOW_QUERY_MS
comment: If query execution takes more time, generate a debug log report

name: DEDALO_SESSION_HANDLER
comment: Options: files | memcached | user | postgresql

name: DEDALO_BACKUP_ON_LOGIN
comment: Options: files | memcached | user | postgresql

name: DEDALO_BACKUP_TIME_RANGE
comment: Minimun lapse of time (in hours) for run backup script again. Default: 4

name: DEDALO_LOGS_DIR
comment: Maintain this directory unaccessible for security

name: LOGGER_LEVEL
comment: Log level. Default in production is ERROR. Options: DEBUG | INFO | NOTICE | WARNING | ERROR | CRITICAL

name: DEDALO_APPLICATION_LANGS
comment: Langs list for menu select.

name: DEDALO_APPLICATION_LANGS_DEFAULT
comment: Default selection on menu lang and default lang for Dédalo interface

name: DEDALO_DATA_LANG_DEFAULT
comment: Default lang for Dédalo data (Normally the same as application)

name: DEDALO_DATA_LANG_SELECTOR
comment: Show the menu data selector to common users

name: DEDALO_PROJECTS_DEFAULT_LANGS
comment: Projects allowed langs

name: DEDALO_DIFFUSION_LANGS
comment: Projects allowed langs

name: DEDALO_TRANSLATOR_URL
comment: Automatic translator url)

name: DEDALO_PREFIX_TIPOS
comment: TLD's to load on update structure)

name: MAIN_FALLBACK_SECTION
comment: Section to load as default after user login

name: DEDALO_PROFILE_DEFAULT
comment: Default profile id to set when new user is created

name: DEDALO_DEFAULT_PROJECT
comment: Default project id to set when new record is created

name: DEDALO_MEDIA_BASE_PATH
comment: Path where media is stored. Referenced to DEDALO_ROOT

name: DEDALO_MEDIA_BASE_URL
comment: Path where media is served by http. Referenced to DEDALO_ROOT_WEB

name: DEDALO_AV_FOLDER
comment: Path (inside DEDALO_MEDIA_BASE_PATH) where media av is stored. Normally '/av'

name: DEDALO_AV_EXTENSION
comment: Files extension. Normally '.mp4'

name: DEDALO_AV_EXTENSIONS_SUPPORTED
comment: Allowed av file extensions.

name: DEDALO_AV_MIME_TYPE
comment: Files mime. Normally 'video/mp4'

name: DEDALO_AV_TYPE
comment: Files mime. Normally 'h264/AAC'

name: DEDALO_AV_QUALITY_ORIGINAL
comment: Default uncompressed file. Normally 'original'

name: DEDALO_AV_QUALITY_DEFAULT
comment: Default work quality file. Normally '404'

name: DEDALO_AV_AR_QUALITY
comment: List of allowed qualities for files. (Each quality generates a dir in media av folder)

name: DEDALO_AV_POSTERFRAME_EXTENSION
comment: Default extension for av posterframe file. Normally 'jpg'

name: DEDALO_AV_FFMPEG_PATH
comment: Full path to ffmpeg daemon. Normally '/usr/bin/ffmpeg'

name: DEDALO_AV_FASTSTART_PATH
comment: Full path to qt-faststart daemon. Normally '/usr/bin/qt-faststart'

name: DEDALO_AV_FFPROBE_PATH
comment: Full path to ffprobe daemon. Normally '/usr/bin/ffprobe'

name: DEDALO_AV_WATERMARK_FILE
comment: File to use in save av file with watermark. Relative path media av folder. Normally '/watermark/watermark.png'

name: TEXT_SUBTITLES_ENGINE
comment: Tool for manage subtitles path. Relative to DEDALO_LIB_BASE_PATH. Normally '/tools/tool_subtitlesg'

name: DEDALO_SUBTITLES_FOLDER
comment: Subtitles files path. Relative path media av folder. Normally '/subtitles'

name: DEDALO_AV_SUBTITLES_EXTENSION
comment: Subtitles files extension. Normally 'vtt'

name: DEDALO_AV_RECOMPRESS_ALL
comment: If 1, force re-compress all av files on upload. Options: 0 | 1 . Default 1

name: DEDALO_DB_TYPE
comment: Dédalo database type . Default 'postgresql'

name: DB_BIN_PATH
comment: Path to database dir like '/usr/local/bin/'

name: DEDALO_HOSTNAME_CONN
comment: Database hostname like 'localhost' or '/tmp' for socket

name: DEDALO_DB_PORT_CONN
comment: Database port connection like 5432 for postgresql

name: DEDALO_DB_PORT_CONN
comment: Optional database port connection like 5432 for postgresql

name: DEDALO_DATABASE_CONN
comment: Database name like 'dedalo4_development'

name: DEDALO_USERNAME_CONN
comment: Database username like 'myuser'

name: DEDALO_PASSWORD_CONN
comment: Database password string

name: DEDALO_INFORMACION
value: la Rana CantoRa baila un baile nUevo +- n`Rño
comment: Dédalo instalation info description. Mandatory

name: MYSQL_DEDALO_HOSTNAME_CONN
comment: Dédalo diffusion MySQL databse host

name: MYSQL_DEDALO_USERNAME_CONN
comment: Dédalo diffusion MySQL databse username

name: MYSQL_DEDALO_DATABASE_CONN
comment: Dédalo diffusion MySQL databse name

name: MYSQL_DEDALO_DB_PORT_CONN
comment: Dédalo diffusion MySQL databse port (default 3306) or socket (optional)

name: MYSQL_DEDALO_SOCKET_CONN
comment: Dédalo diffusion MySQL databse socket (optional)
